ygData.subject: Re: The War of Decay
ygData.msgSnippet: Yep. That s pretty much how it s unfolding across the multiverse! Eqestreille becomes corrupted, blighted mares show up in Lfay. Undead sprites (including
ygData.messageBody:
Yep. That's pretty much how it's unfolding across
the multiverse! Eqestreille becomes corrupted,
blighted mares show up in Lfay. Undead sprites (including
horrors and guards and guardians) fly all over. Beware
the Horrors, they are very agressive and harm touch
for 171. But they sometimes proc rejuvenate during
combat which fully heals you and restores mana. Wild the
first time it happens! Good loot, lots of no drop lore
including a piercer usable by all races and classes even if
you do noy have the skill!<br><br>I went from 25 to
26 in just a couple of hours there.<br><br>Timmye
Cousteau<br><br>The Wolf of Karana
